# ImagePlaygroundPersonalizationPolicy.automatic

**Case**

An option to choose the most appropriate personalization behavior.

## Declaration

```swift
case automatic
```

## Discussion

This value equals [doc://com.apple.ImagePlayground/documentation/ImagePlayground/ImagePlaygroundPersonalizationPolicy/enabled] by default.

## Getting the policy

- **ImagePlaygroundPersonalizationPolicy.enabled**: An option to enable personalization features in the view controller.
- **ImagePlaygroundPersonalizationPolicy.disabled**: An option to disable personalization features in the view controller.
